answers.answer: Usually the measurement is close to the same as weeks you are. So 27-28 weeks normally is between 25-30 cm. Your dr is most likely doing a growth scan to make sure the dates are looking good. You are basically measuring 3-5 weeks ahead. I wouldn't worry too much all babies grow different and belly measurements are not 100%!

Just to prove what C_bay said, I just got an extra scan because I was measuring small and my baby is absolutely fine. Though for babies measuring big they may be concerned about gestational diabetes. Have you been tested for that yet?

question: So i'll be 28 weeks tomorrow. Last week at my appt my stomach was measuring 33cm so the doctor ordered an ultarsound for my next appt on august 6th. my question is what is the "normal" belly measurement at 27/28 weeks?
title: Big mama
